description:
This is a large studio with stylish antique finishes and a separate kitchen. It has a bathtub in the washroom, is clean, and steps to the ABCD etrains. Express trains take only 15 minutes or less to Columbus circle (south end of Central Park). It's a great calm spot with stunning transportation options, lots of cafes nearby, and a great vibe.
.

My place is good for couples and solo adventurers.

you have a private studio, private small kitchen, and private washroom with tub.  This studio is the back main floor of a brownstone

There are lots of cafes and pubs, up and coming neighborhood with a lot of old world charm.  Sugarhill is a historic district.

ABCD express trains within 3 min walk. 1 train within 6 min walk.  Fifteen minutes to midtown.  For real.
name: Private Turn of the Century Brownstone Studio
review: Love the character of Max's space. Super close to public transit and eating locations. Overall experience was great but this AirBnB isn't for everyone. It is clear that this is one of Max's primary residences as it has a very "lived in" feel and look. If you are adventurous, eccentric and open minded I would suggest this location as an awesome choice.
